doctitle.textblock: Opening of Land in a Proposed Withdrawal; South Dakota

summary.textblock: This notice terminates the temporary segregative effect of a proposed withdrawal of 2 acres of National Forest System land for the old Spokane Mine and millsite.

further.textblock: Sandra Ward, BLM Montana State Office, P.O. Box 36800, Billings, Montana 59107, 406-255-2949.

supplem.textblock: Pursuant to the regulations contained in 43 CFR 2310.2-1(e), at 9 a.m. on March 5, 1994, the following described land will be relieved of the segregative effect of withdrawal application SDM 80731. The withdrawal application will continue to be processed, unless it is canceled or denied.
(A 2-acre parcel within the following described land):
The area described contains 2 acres in Custer County.

signjob.textblock: Acting Deputy State Director, Division of Lands and Renewable Resources.
